attributes.action: MAKE THE POLITICIANS ACCOUNTABLE FOR OUR NATIONS UNPRECEDENTED DEBT & THE DOWNFALL OF OUR GREAT NATION!
attributes.additional_details:
Labour's wasted billions of taxes and generations face paying back this debt with dire consequences of unprecedented cutbacks.

Going into the ‘08 crisis; Institute for Fiscal Studies: Labour had left the UK with 1 of the largest structural budget deficits in the developed world, most OECD countries did more to strengthen their public finances during Labour’s first 11 years in office than Labour did in the UK’

BOE: We are confronted with a situation where the scale of deficits is truly extraordinary. This reflects the fact that we came into this crisis with fiscal policy on a path that wasn’t sustainable and a correction was needed. May 1997, public sector net debt was £351 billion, by April 2010 it more than doubled to £893 billion.

It's criminal how they wasted our taxes, they have left us a broken nation and yet: not 1 single person has been brought to book for this savagery on our countries finances, they should be brought to justice once and for all!
